text.晴れわたる空のもと行われる、%course\\n%ground%distance: Under clearing skies at %course, %ground \n%distance %race. %h_num_no Uma-musume will \ntake on the challenge.
text.曇り空のもと、%course\\n%ground%distance%race\\: Under cloudy skies at %course, %ground\n%distance %race. %h_num_no horse girls\ntake on the challenge!
text.足元悪い雨の中、%course\\n%ground%distance%race\: %ground %distance %race at %course. %h_num_no\nUma-Musume take on the challenge in the rain.
text.抜けるような青空のもと%course\\n%ground%distance%ra: Under %course's clear blue skies, %h_num_no \nUma Musume are ready to take on the %ground \n%distance %race!
text.波乱の香り漂う曇り空のもと行われる\\n%course\\n%ground%di:
The %course %ground %distance %race 
%h_num_no horse girls will take on the 
challenge under cloudy skies with a 
hint of turbulence in the air.
text.天が与えた試練の雨が、波乱含みの%course\\n%ground%distan:
It's finally time to run the %course 
%course %ground %distance %race, where 
the rain, a test given by the heavens, 
has caused some turbulence.
text.寒さ続く%course、試練が待ち受けていた\\n雪降る%race\\n%gro: It is a cold %course and a snowy %race \n%ground %distance with a trial in waiting \nthat will result in victory!
text.美しい青空が広がる、%course\\nターフも絶好の良バ場になりました！: With beautiful blue skies, the %course turf\nhas become a perfect buffer!
text.輝く太陽のもとに開かれている、%course\\n良と発表されたバ場には、砂塵が: There is a cloud of dust in the\nbaba, announced as %course good,\nopen to the shining sun!
text.ゆったりと流れる美しい雲\\n青空広がる、%course\\n前日に降った雨のた:
The beautiful clouds flowed slowly and the 
blue sky spread out, but the rain that fell 
the day before the %course made it a little 
heavy, not perfect.
text.晴天のもとに開催される、%course\\n降っては止みを繰り返した天気のため\: The %course will be held under sunny skies,\nand the weather conditions are expected to be\na little heavy due to repeated showers.
text.上空には灰色の空が広がる、%course\\n天気はなんとか持ちこたえ、良バ場の: With gray skies above, the weather\nat %course has managed to hold up,\nand a good track is announced!
text.どんよりした雲が空を覆う\\n%course\\nこの空を映したように芝は稍重の: A cloudburst covered the sky %course, and the \ngrass was a little heavy, reflecting this sky.
text.時折雨が落ちる、%course\\n天の気まぐれにより、\\nバ場の引き締まった: Due to the fickle weather, with occasional \nrain falling at %course, the track is a \nlittle heavy, with the field tightening up.
text.あいにくの雨が芝を濡らす、%course\\nバ場状態の発表は重となってしまいま: Unfortunately, the rain was soaking the \ngrass, and the announcement of the condition \nof the %course was heavy!
text.天から涙がこぼれる、%course\\n重バ場発表となってしまったダートで\\n: Tears spilled from the heavens as a grueling\nrace was held on dirt that had been announced\nas a heavy %course!
text.荒れた天候の、%course\\n降り続いた雨がバ場状態を悪化させ\\n不良の発: Rough weather at %course. The\nconstant rainfall worsened the\nfield conditions to poor.
text.強い雨の、%course\\n雨で濡れた砂はヌルリと滑る\\n不良バ場となってし: The strong, %course rain-soaked sand became a\nslippery, slippery bad baba!
text.昨日から続く雪がちらつく、%course\\n除雪が終わった芝コースの状態は稍重: With snow flurries continuing from yesterday,\nthe condition of the grass %course was a\nlittle heavy after the plowing was completed.
text.曇天から降り注ぐ雪の中、ウマ娘たちは走ります\\n%course、ダートコースは: Uma Musume run in the snow falling from the\ncloudy sky! The dirt track at %course is\nreported to be slightly heavy.
text.舞い散る雪がターフを白く染めあげます\\n除雪作業の進むここ、%course\\:
Snow flurries are turning the turf 
white. Snow removal work is underway 
here, and the announcement of the state 
of the %course bar is heavy.
text.灰色の空から舞い散る雪という名の白い天使たち\\n%course、ダートコースは: White angels named snow fluttering\nfrom a gray sky %course, dirt %course\nis a heavy announcement!
text.ファンファーレが高らかに響く！\\n春のGⅠ開幕戦、フェブラリーステークス！: The fanfare echoes loudly! The opening race \nof the spring G1, the Feburary Stakes!
text.オオカン桜が見守るもとでの熱き戦い！\\n電撃6ハロン、高松宮記念！: A fierce battle under the watchful eye of the\ntoucan cherry blossoms! Blitz 6-Halon,\nTakamatsu-no-Miya Kinen!
text.早春の阪神に最強を自負するウマ娘が集う！\\n春の中・長距離三冠、第一弾、大阪杯:
The strongest horse girls gather at Hanshin 
in early spring! The first part of the 
spring triple crown of middle and long 
distance, the Osaka Cup!
text.咲き誇る桜が女王の誕生を待ち望む！\\nクラシック第一弾！桜花賞！: The blooming cherry blossoms await the\nbirth of their queen! The first classic!\nThe Cherry Blossom Award!
text.最も『はやい』ウマ娘が勝つという皐月賞！\\n成長を見せつけるのは誰だ！: The fastest horse girl will win Satsuki-sho!\nLet's see who will show their growth!
text.唯一無二、一帖の盾をかけた熱き戦い！\\n最長距離GⅠ天皇賞（春）！: A fierce battle for the one and only\nshield! The longest distance GI,\nthe Tennou-shou (Spring)!
text.世代最速を自負するウマ娘が府中に集う！\\nNHKマイルカップ！: The fastest horse girl of the generation\ngathers in Fuchu! NHK Mile Cup!
text.女神見守る府中に天使が舞い降りる！\\nヴィクトリアに見初められた者が勝者となる: An angel descends on Fuchu under the watchful \neye of the Goddess! The winner will be the \none who is discovered by Victoria!
text.樫の女王を目指すウマ娘が府中に集う！\\nオークスで戴冠するのは誰だ！: Uma Musume gather in Fuchu to become \nthe Queen of the Oaks! Who will \nbe crowned in the Oaks?
text.すべてのウマ娘が目指す頂点、日本ダービー！\\n歴史に蹄跡を残すのは誰だ！: The pinnacle that all horse girls aim\nfor, the Japan Derby! Who will leave\nthe hoofprints in the history!
text.快速自慢が集う東京マイル・安田記念！\\n春のマイル王は誰の手に！: The Tokyo Mile Yasuda Kinen, a race for the\nfast and the proud! Who will be the King of\nthe Spring Mile!
text.票に託されたファンの夢\\n思いを力にかえて走るグランプリ・宝塚記念！: Takarazuka Kinen, the Grand Prix of Japan,\nwhere the dreams of fans entrusted with their\nvotes are turned into power!
text.秋の気配が近づく中山に快速自慢が集う！\\n電光石火・スプリンターズステークス！: Boasts of speed gather at Nakayama as autumn\napproaches! Sprinters' Stakes, a\nlightning-fast race!
text.賑やかな秋を彩る秋華たち\\n秋華賞の舞台で美しく華を咲かせるのは誰だ！: Who will bloom beautifully on\nthe stage of the Akika-sho?
text.クラシックロードの終着点\\n菊花賞を制し最強の称号を手にするのは誰だ！: Who will win the Kikka-sho, the\nend of the classic road, and take\nhome the title of the best!
text.ウマ娘たちが追い求める一帖の盾\\n鍛えた脚を武器に往く栄光への道！\\n天皇賞: A shield for the horse girls to pursue, a \npath to glory with their trained legs! The \nEmperor's Award (Autumn)!
text.日の丸とユニオンジャックに見守られ、\\n淀のターフでエリザベス女王杯を掲げるの: Who will raise the Queen Elizabeth Cup on the\nYodo Turf, watched over by the Japanese flag\nand the Union Jack!
text.長く続いたマイル路線も終わりを迎える\\n王者誕生！ マイルチャンピオンシップ！: The longest running mileage route\ncomes to an end, and a champion\nis born! Mile Championship!
text.世界のウマ娘が栄光を求め\\nジャパンカップの府中に集う！\\n日本勢は対抗でき: Uma Musume from around the world gather in\nFuchu for the Japan Cup in search of glory!\nCan the Japanese compete?
text.砂上の戦いを求める猛者が集う！\\nダート王決定戦、チャンピオンズカップ！: Fierce competitors gather for a battle on the\nsand! Champion of Dirt, Champions Cup!
text.寒空の阪神に熱き心の若駒が揃う！\\nクラシックへの道、阪神ジュベナイルフィリー: Hot-hearted young horses gather at Hanshin in\ncold weather! The road to the Classic, the\nHanshin Juvenile Fillies!
text.クラシックへの登竜門\\n朝日杯フューチュリティステークス！\\nここから道はは: The Asahi Cup Futurity Stakes, the gateway to\nthe Classic! This is where the road begins!
text.年末の中山で争われる夢のグランプリ・有馬記念！\\nあなたの夢、私の夢は叶うのか: The Grand Prix of dreams, Arima Kinen, to be\nfought on Nakayama at the end of the year!\nWill your dream, my dream come true?
text.誰をも魅了し、心を奪う希望の星が誕生する！\\nホープフルステークス！: A star of hope is born who will charm and\nsteal everyone's heart! The Hopeful Stakes!
text.日々のトレーニングで力を蓄えたウマ娘たちが\\nついにレースの舞台におりたちます:
After building up their strength through 
daily training, the Uma Musume are finally 
ready to take the stage for the race! 
Training Race!
text.可能性を秘めたウマ娘たちが\\nはじめて本番の舞台に立つ！\\nビギナー戦スター: Uma-musume with hidden potential\ntake the stage for the first time!\nThe beginner race begins!
text.最強と呼ばれる者ですら負けることはある\\n敗者復活戦から再起を図るのは誰だ！: Even the strongest of us can lose, and who\nwill rise again from the ranks of the losers?
text.一勝をあげてもウマ娘に休む暇はない\\n新たな壁を突破するのは誰だ\\nヴァルゴ: One win is no rest for the wolves,\nand who will break through the\nnew barrier, Vargo Race!
text.黄道に美しく輝くハマルのように\\n光を放つウマ娘は誰だ！\\nアリエスレース！: Who will shine like a beautiful hamar on the\necliptic? Aries Race!
text.旅人に北を教える美しき星座\\nウマ娘たちにも道しるべとなるのか！\\nカシオペ: Will you be a beacon to the beautiful\nconstellation Uma Muses who teach travelers\nthe north! Cassiopeia Race!
text.美しく輝くベテルギウスのように\\n最も強い光となるのは誰だ！\\nオリオンレー: Who will be the most powerful light, like the\nbeautiful Betelgeuse! The Orion race!

text.ここまで2勝の%team_name、\\n追うチーム＜ファースト＞！\\n注目の: Team %team_name has won two races so far, and\nTeam First is chasing! The fourth race of the\nseason is about to begin!
text.後のない%team_name！\\n大事な第4レース、\\n勝ち取ることができる: This is it! Can %team_name win the\nall-important fourth race?
text.いよいよ最終第5レース\\n%team_honor%team_name、\\nこ: Now it's time for the fifth and final race,\n%team_honor %team_name.
text.%team_name！\\n迎え撃つチーム＜ファースト＞！\\n運命の最終レース: %team_name! Team First! What will be the\noutcome of this fateful final race!
text.いよいよ最終第5レース\\n%team_honor%team_name、\\n勝: Will the fifth and final race, %team_honor\n%team_name, be the one to take the win?
text.運命の最終レース\\n%team_name、\\n栄光を手にすることができるので: The final race of destiny, %team_name, will\nyou be able to take home the glory!
text.勝っ%h_rank_ta1！\\n%team_name、これで2勝目！\\n栄光: Win %h_rank_ta1! %team_name, that's two wins!\nYou're on your way to glory!
text.やりました、%h_rank_l1！\\nそして、アオハル杯の歴史に残る名勝負を\: You did it, %h_rank_l1! And the winner of the\nmost famous game in the history of the Aohar\nCup is, %team_name!
text.1着は%h_rank_l1！\\n素晴らしい走りでチームに勝利をもたらしました！: First place goes to %h_rank_l1! A fantastic\nrun to give his team the win!
text.アオハル杯第2レース\\n%team_name、\\nこのレースでも素晴らしい走: Race 2 of the Aoharu Hai, %team_name, you're\ngoing to have another great run in this race!
text.%team_name！\\n迎え撃つチーム＜ファースト＞！\\nこの第2レースも: %team_name! Team First! Expect another heated\nrace in this second race!
text.%team_name、\\nこの第2レースでも\\n勝利を掴むことができるのでし: %team_name, will you be able to win this\nsecond race as well?
text.アオハル杯第2レースが始まります\\n%team_name、\\n1戦目の雪辱を: Race 2 of the Aoharu Hai is about to\nbegin! Will %team_name be able to redeem\nitself from the first race?
text.折り返しとなる第3レース\\n%team_name、\\nファンの声援に応えるこ: The decisive third race. Will %team_name be \nable to answer the fans' cheers?
text.%team_name！\\n迎え撃つのはチーム＜ファースト＞！\\n最高の形で後: %team_name! Team First! Which team will\nconnect to the second half in the best way?
text.%team_name！\\nここまで1着を逃していません\\nこの第3レースも期: %team_name! We haven't missed a single\nrace so far! Expectations are high\nfor this third race as well!
text.王手をかけた\\n%team_name！\\n対するチーム＜ファースト＞は\\n: %team_name has the upper hand! Will the\nopposing team, First, be able to pull it off?
text.折り返しとなる第3レース\\n%team_name、\\n良い結果を手に後半へつ: We've arrived at the turning point, the third \nrace, and it's up to %team_name to get a good \nresult and make it to the second half!
text.後がなくなりました、\\n%team_name！\\nここからの巻き返しに期待し: We're running out of time, %team_name! Let's\nhope we can turn things around from here!
text.アオハル杯第4レース\\n%team_name、\\nここをみごとに勝利して、\: The fourth race of the Aoharu Hai, \n%team_name, will you be able to win this race \nand make it to the final race?
text.%team_name！\\n迎え撃つチーム＜ファースト＞！\\n最終レースに向け: %team_name! Team First! Who will gain \nmomentum for the final race!
text.%team_name、\\nこの第4レースで決着をつけることが\\nできるのでし: %team_name, will you be able\nto settle this fourth race!
text.いよいよ最終第5レース\\n%team_name、\\nここまで走り繋いだメンバ: Now it's time for the fifth and\nfinal race, %team_name.
text.いよいよ最終第5レース\\n%team_name、\\n勝利を掴むことができるの: Finally, the fifth and final \nrace, %team_name, will you be \nable to take the victory?
text.この1戦で頂点が決まる！\\nジェミニ杯決勝！: This one game will decide who comes out on\ntop! Gemini Cup Final!
text.やりました%h_rank_l1！\\nみごと先頭でゴールを駆け抜け、\\nジェミ: You did it, %h_rank_l1! She led the pack to\nthe finish line and won the Gemini Cup!
text.勝ち残った優駿たちの最後の大舞台！\\nキャンサー杯決勝！: The last big stage for the surviving\nchampions! The Cancer Cup Final!
text.勝ちました%h_rank_l1！\\nキャンサー杯を制し、\\nその名を歴史に刻: We won it %h_rank_l1! You've won the Cancer\nCup and made your name in the history books!
text.ついに大舞台の幕が開けます！\\nレオ杯決勝！: At last, the curtain rises on the big stage!\nThe Leo Cup Final!
text.優勝は%h_rank_l1！\\n優駿たるその走りで、\\nレオ杯をみごとに制し: The winner is %h_rank_l1! She drove like a\nchampion and won the Leo Cup in style!
text.勝っ%h_rank_ta1！\\n最後のレースをみごとに勝ち、\\nヴァルゴ杯の: She won %h_rank_ta1! She won the \nlast race in a convincing fashion \nto capture the Vargo Cup crown!
text.やりました%h_rank_l1！\\n強豪が集うこのレースを制し、\\nライブラ: We did it, %h_rank_l1! We won this race of \nthe strongest competitors, and we are the \nLibra Cup winners!
text.勝ちました%h_rank_l1！\\nスコーピオ杯を勝利し、\\n最強の座をもの: We won %h_rank_l1! We won the Scorpio Cup, \nand we are the best of the best!
text.優勝は%h_rank_l1！\\nみごとサジタリウス杯を制し、\\n優駿の頂点へ: The winner is %h_rank_l1! She won \nthe Sagittarius Cup and stands at \nthe top of the championship!
text.勝っ%h_rank_ta1！\\nこの大舞台を見事勝利し、\\nカプリコーン杯を: She won%h_rank_ta1! She won the Capricorn Cup \nwith an impressive victory on this big stage!
text.やりました%h_rank_l1！\\nアクエリアス杯を制し、\\nみごと栄冠を掴: We did it %h_rank_l1! We won the Aquarius Cup \nand took the crown!
text.勝ちました%h_rank_l1！\\n並みいる強豪を跳ね除け、ピスケス杯を制しま: We won the %h_rank_l1! We beat off the best \nof the best to win the Pisces Cup!
text.優勝は%h_rank_l1！\\n頂点に立つにふさわしい走りで、\\nアリエス杯: The winner is %h_rank_l1! She deserved to be \non top and won the Aries Cup!
text.さぁ始まります、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス！\\n第1戦、三冠ウマ娘: Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! Round \n1, the Triple Crown winner, %h_player, is \nexpected to live up to her name!
text.さぁ始まります、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス！\\n第1戦、秋の三冠ウ:
Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! In 
the first race, we look forward to seeing the

%h_player, live up to her name!

Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! In 
the first race, the Triple Crown winner of 
spring, %h_player, we look forward to a run 
worthy of her name!
text.さぁ始まります、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス！\\n第1戦、2大マイル: Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! The \nwinner of the first two major mileage races, \n%h_player, is expected to live up to her name!
text.さぁ始まります、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス！\\n第1戦、2大スプリ:
Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! We 
are looking forward to the first race, and 
the winner of the two major sprints, 
%h_player, to live up to her name!
text.さぁ始まります、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス！\\n第1戦、2大ダート: Here it comes, the Twinkle Star Climax! The \nwinner of the first two major dirt races, \n%h_player, is expected to live up to her name!
text.勝利へ1歩リードした%h_player、\\n今回も実力を見せつけるのか！\\n:
With a one-step lead to victory, will 
%h_player show her skills again this time? 
The crowd's expectations are rising for the 
second round of the Twinkle Star Climax!
text.トゥインクルスタークライマックス 第2戦！\\n現在トップの%h_player、: Twinkle Star Climax Round 2! Will %h_player, \nthe current leader, keep up her momentum to \nbe crowned the top Twinkle Star?
text.トゥインクルスタークライマックス 最終第3戦！\\n互角の戦いを見せてきた\\n: Twinkle Star Climax Final Round 3! Who will \ntake the victory, %horse_a1%horse_to2 or \n%horse_a1%horse_to2?
text.ついに迎えます、\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス 最終第3戦！\\n現在同: At last, we welcome you to the third and \nfinal round of the Twinkle Star Climax! Who \nwill take the glory, %horse_a1 or %horse_to2?
text.決着の時が近づいてきました\\nトゥインクルスタークライマックス 最終第3戦！\:
It's time for the final showdown in the 
third and final round of the Twinkle Star 
Climax! The %h_player is within striking 
distance of the lead, but will she be 
able to pull off the upset?
text.トゥインクルスタークライマックス 最終第3戦！\\n圧倒的強さを見せつけてきた%:
Twinkle Star Climax Final Round 
3! Will %h_player, who has shown 
overwhelming strength, continue 
to win the Twinkle Star Climax?
text.現在の総合トップは%h_player、\\nこのまま最強の称号を手にするのか！\:
The current overall leader is %h_player, will 
she continue to take the title of the 
strongest! Twinkle Star Climax Final Round 3! 
It's about to begin!
text.1着でゴールし%h_player_ta！\\n最強の座に向け、最高の滑り出しです: She finished first and %h_player_ta! She's \noff to a great start on her quest for the \ntitle of strongest!
text.勝ちました%h_player！\\nトゥインクルトップスターへ\\nいち早く抜け: %h_player has won! And taken a head start to \nbe our Twinkle Top Star!
text.第2戦を制し%h_player_ta！\\n最終戦に向け、大きく勢いをつけました: We won the second round and %h_player_ta! \nWe have a big momentum going into \nthe final round!
text.1着でゴールし%h_player_ta！\\nこれで2勝！\\n栄光ヘ向け、大き: She finished in first place and %h_player_ta! \nThis is two wins!
text.勝ちました%h_player！\\nこれで総合1位となり、\\nトゥインクルトッ: We've won, %h_player! This puts us in first \nplace overall and puts us well on our way to \nthe Twinkle Top Star!
text.勝っ%h_player_ta！\\nこの長き戦いも終わり、\\nついにトゥインク: The winner is %h_player_ta! The long battle \nis over, and the Twinkle Top Star will \nfinally be crowned!
text.1着は%h_player！\\nこれでトゥインクルスタークライマックス\\n全3: First place goes to %h_player! This concludes \nall three rounds of the Twinkle Star Climax, \nand finally the Twinkle Top Star is born!
text.最終第3戦を制し%h_player_ta！\\n他を寄せ付けぬ圧倒的実力！いまこ: The winner of the third and final round, \n%h_player_ta! Here is the birth of the most \npowerful Uma-Musume ever!
text.やりました！ %h_player！\\n見事な逆転劇！\\n大一番を制し、\\n: They did it! %h_player! A stunning comeback! \nThey've claimed victory in the decisive race \nand attained the title of Twinkle Top Star!
